name: dvdmsscn
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))

stmt.origin: sseldi(c0, cpw(c1), co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wss(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1), cpw(c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ P(c1))
⊣ ((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1)⊆ P(c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wss(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1), cpw(c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℂ)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℂ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ P(c1)→ c0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ ((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1)⊆ P(c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))

|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℂ)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℂ)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, c1 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wss(c1, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wss(c1, cc))

|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℂ)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })

comment: ` X ` is a subset of ` CC ` . This statement is very often used when computing derivatives. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
